attributes.action: George Soros should be investigated for interference of British politics.
attributes.background:
Documents have been released revealing George Soros has a list of 226 "Reliable Allies" (MEP's) within the EU.
He has met European leaders on numerous occasions in private and has affiliate MP's within British parliament who have links to his "Open Society" which he recently donated $18billion to.

rejection.details:
George Soros is not a Member of the UK Parliament or Government. 

If you believe that a Member of the UK House of Commons has broken the House of Commons Code of Conduct, you may wish to contact the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/contact-us/
